text:
Inspired by the #warmingstripes developed by @ed_hawkins, here is a representation of daily deaths of #COVID19 patients since the beginning of the #pandemic in 4 countries (🇫🇷 🇺🇸 🇮🇳 🇿🇦), showing contrasted peaks.

#Rstats #ggplot2 #TidyTuesday

#MaskUp #WashYourHands #vaccine https://t.co/RaHEbeuFiV
